title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 101 - Underground Electric Facility Construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 101 - Underground Electric Facility Construction

State Regulations
§ 101.1 - Definitions
§ 101.2 - Clearance requirements of new underground electric facilities from gas and liquid petroleum pipelines
§ 101.3 - Clearance requirements of subsurface electric facilities constructed to replace existing facilities
§ 101.4 - Standards and practices applicable to the construction and environmental management of subsurface electric facilities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 101

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§65, 66

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
